orders.title: Production
orders.description: This order is for the production of industrial machinery. It involves manufacturing various components and assembling them according to the provided specifications. The production process includes machining, welding, and quality control inspections.

orders.title: Maintenance
orders.description: This order is for the maintenance of existing equipment at a power plant. It includes inspecting and repairing electrical systems, conducting preventive maintenance tasks, and ensuring the smooth operation of the machinery. The maintenance work was carried out successfully, and all necessary repairs were completed within the specified timeframe.

orders.title: Installation
orders.description: This order is for the installation of a new conveyor system in a manufacturing facility. The system will improve the efficiency of material handling and streamline the production process. The installation team is currently waiting for the delivery of the equipment and will commence work as soon as it arrives. The estimated completion time is yet to be determined.

orders.title: Customization
orders.description: This order is for the customization of industrial robots. The robots will be programmed and modified to perform specific tasks according to the customer's requirements. The customization process involves software development, integration of additional sensors, and testing to ensure optimal performance. The order is currently pending, awaiting final approval from the customer.

orders.title: Repair
orders.description: This order is for the repair of a malfunctioning conveyor belt in a factory. The repair team has identified the issue and is currently replacing damaged components and conducting necessary adjustments. The goal is to restore the conveyor belt's functionality and minimize downtime for the production line.
